prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: He has worked on scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society and is actively involved in the tech community. Pavol regularly gives lectures at conferences, serves on juries, and mentors in various competitions, both in the Czech Republic and internationally.
